descriptionHtml:
[center][b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff7700][size=5]-Foreword-[/size][/color][/font][/b][/center]
Apology for my bad English, it is not my first language, please excuse me for using google translate on responses.
This mod adds a new follower. 
This mod always need [color=#00ffff][b][u]Skyim.esm[/u][/b][/color]

[center][b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff7700][size=5]-How to find him-[/size][/color][/font][/b][/center]
Go to [b][u]The Winking Skeever[/u] .[/b]
You can see him.
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff7700][size=5][b]-Description-[/b][/size][/color][/font][/center]
[size=3]This is a simple follower mod[/size] .
[size=3]name:Albert·J·Lex
level:the same to your char,max 255[/size][size=3]
[/size]
[center][b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff7700][size=5]-Installation-[/size][/color][/font][/b][/center]
Just use NMM to install it or simply extract files to skyrim/data

[center][b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff7700][size=5]-Used Resources-[/size][/color][/font][/b][/center]
[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55364/]Kijiko Hair[/url][/size] by Kijiko and Goldiocks

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?][size=4]Enhanced Character Edit[/size][/url]by ECE team
[url=http://www.skycitizen.net/post/66421][size=4]CR enb [/size][/url]by abc75179778300  
[size=4][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/?]Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces [/url][/b][/size]- New hairstyles by [b]Chris57 and FavoredSoul[/b]

[center][b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff7700][size=5]-Translation-[/size][/color][/font][/b][/center]
If any Chinese speakers are interested in this mod and wish to get a Chinese version. 
Please click [url=http://www.skycitizen.net/post/72486]here[/url].
author: gongjin and DiorSoul
